snippet: The National Geographic Channel said that Melissa Bachman, an animal hunter who writes for a blog called “Hardcore Huntress,” will no longer be a participant in the coming reality series “Ultimate Survivor Alaska.”
abstract: National Geographic Channel says that Melissa Bachman, an animal hunter who writes for a blog called Hardcore Huntress, will no longer be a participant in reality series Ultimate Survivor Alaska; decision is made after an online petition protesting her involvement receives more than 13,000 signatures in less than 24 hours.
lead_paragraph: The National Geographic Channel said that Melissa Bachman, an animal hunter who writes for a blog called “Hardcore Huntress,” will no longer be a participant in the coming reality series “Ultimate Survivor Alaska.”

headline.main: National Geographic Takes Hunter Off TV Show
headline.print_headline: National Geographic Takes Hunter Off TV Show
